page.title: 12SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: {EVEN IN A COUNTRY DISTRICT SUCH AS {THIS,ADVANCES MADE SINCE THE ZEPPELINS {OF 1914-18,THE DOODLE BUGS OF 1939-45 {AND THE PILL BOXES AGAINST THE WEAPON {SYSTEMS OF THE SECOND WORLD WAR, ARE {VERY APPARENT. MICRO-ELECTRONICS, {MODERN HYDRAULIC SYSTEMS, VETERINARY {MEDICINE AND MECHANISATION HAVE {TRANSFORMED FARMING REDUCING THE {NUMBER OF JOBS AVAILABLE TO LOCALS. THE USE OF CHEMICAL FERTILISATION, PESTICIDES AND ANABOLIC STERIODS ARE UNDER ATTACK AS THEY COULD BE USED TO THE DETRIMENT OF HUMANS,FAUNA & FLORA. {YOU,MY DEAR FRIEND IN THE FUTURE WILL {KNOW WHETHER WE WERE RIGHT OR NOT. MEDICAL RESEARCH CONTINUES AT BROCKHAM PARK(BEECHAMS)IN SPITE OF THE FACT THE DAYS OF OUR PARENTS "M&B"TREATMENT ARE ALREADY LONG GONE,BUT CONCERN ABOUT MODERN DRUG DEPENDANCE GIVES HERBAL AND OTHER TREATMENTS A NEW AWAKENING ?
